name: Gluttonous Greaves
passive: The “Conversion” passive turns a portion of your damage into omnivamp, allowing you to stay in fights longer. Especially useful for marksmen, fighters, and junglers who frequently skirmish and require extra healing from their attacks.
active: S to attack damage and movement speed, while the “Conversion” passive turns a portion of your damage into omnivamp, allowing you to stay in fights longer. Especially useful for marksmen, fighters, and junglers who frequently skirmish and require extra healing from their attacks.
tips: Gluttonous GreavesAttack Damage, Omnivamp +35 Attack Damage +45 Move Speed.Conversion: +7% Omnivamp.

1400


These boots are perfect for champions who rely on auto-attacks and need constant sustain.
They provide bonuses to attack damage and movement speed, while the “Conversion” passive turns a portion of your damage into omnivamp, allowing you to stay in fights longer.
Especially useful for marksmen, fighters, and junglers who frequently skirmish and require extra healing from their attacks.
